title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Mobile-Based Contextual English Learning Program for Real-World Application

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can communicate using at least ten essential English expressions in everyday situations (shopping, transportation, restaurants).
Learners can practice English conversation in real-world settings at least three times weekly via a mobile app and submit records.
Learners can apply at least two self-directed learning strategies using mobile device camera/audio recording features in situational English learning.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
